segments.text: Yes , I'm looking for a new winter coat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you any particular color in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know really.What ' s the fashional color this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good.Red suits me very well.It ' s a cheerful color , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , madam , I agree.What size are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I used to be size fourteen , but I've put on a bit of weight recently , so may be sixteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are , madam.All these are sixteens .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I quite like this one.How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's too expensive.Aren ' t there any cheaper ones ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: These are our cheapest coats , madam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see . I'll take it.Here ' s $ 200 .
segments.speaker: S2
